column4: Utz Brands, Inc. engages in manufacture, marketing, and distribution of snack foods in the United States. The company offers various salty snacks, including potato chips, tortilla chips, pretzels, cheese snacks, pub/party mixes, pork skins, ready-to-eat popcorn, and other snacks which include salsa and dips, as well as seasonal favorites. It sells its products under the Utz, Zapp's, On The Border, Golden Flake, and Boulder Canyon, TORTIYAHS!, Hawaiian, Bachman, Tim's Cascade, Dirty Potato Chips, TGI Fridays, and Vitner's brands through DSD and direct-to-warehouse distribution methods, retailers or via distributors, supermarkets, mass merchandisers, club warehouses, convenience stores and other large-scale retailers, merchants, distributors, brokers, wholesalers, and Ios. The company was founded in 1921 and is headquartered in Hanover, Pennsylvania.
